column1: Data in this spreadsheet is pulled from the NCBI Genome database: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/
For each taxon, we have filtered for "complete" genomes
For each set of complete genomes, we have removed duplicates according to "Organism Name"
What remains is a count of all distinct organisms, broken down by various hierarchies of taxa
Here is are there various assembly levels available in NCBI:
